translations: 超出，超越；胜过（某人），超过（某项成就）

sentences.sentence: Tomorrow we will transcend these as well, and the dreamers will deserve a lot of the credit.
sentences.translation: 明天我们也将超越这些成就，且梦想家们将会得到更多的荣誉。

sentences.sentence: Baudelaire regarded photography as "a very humble servant of art and science"; a medium largely unable to transcend "external reality".
sentences.translation: 波德莱尔认为摄影是“艺术和科学的一个非常卑微的仆人”；是一种很大程度上无法超越“外部现实”的媒介。

sentences.sentence: Both Martin Luther King and John Kennedy appealed to the idea that humans can transcend what were once considered inherent limitations.
sentences.translation: 马丁·路德·金和约翰·肯尼迪都发起呼吁，倡导人类能够超越曾经被认为是固有局限性的观点。
